title: Hello there!
text:
I’m a Senior Data Scientist at Prodigy Education.
I received a PhD in Applied Cognitive Science from the University of Guelph’s College of Social and Applied Human Sciences in 2017. As the top student in my doctoral cohort, I was honoured with the university’s “most prestigious convocating graduate award,” the John Vanderkamp Doctoral Graduate Medal.
I’m an experienced data and research scientist, having worked in academia for more than 10 years and in industry at health-tech and ed-tech startups for more than 7 years.
I’m passionate about applying research and data science to improve decision-making at organizations that want to help people and improve society.
